code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{useParams}from'react-router-dom';import AdminService from'../../services/AdminService';import'../../styles/PlanDetails.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ViewPlanComponent=()=>{const{id}=useParams();const[travelPlan,setTravelPlan]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const fetchTravelPlan=()=>{AdminService.getPlanById(id).then(response=>{setTravelPlan(response.data);}).catch(error=>{console.error('Error fetching travel plan:',error);});};fetchTravelPlan();},[id]);if(!travelPlan){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Loading..."});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container travel-plan-details",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-md-12",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:"panel travel-plan-panel",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"panel-body travel-plan-body",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-md-6",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"travel-plan-img-details",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:travelPlan.imageUrl,alt:travelPlan.origin})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"col-md-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h4",{className:"travel-plan-d-title",children:[travelPlan.origin," to ",travelPlan.destination]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:travelPlan.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"travel-plan-meta",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"travel-plan-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Start Date:"})," ",travelPlan.startDate]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"travel-plan-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"End Date:"})," ",travelPlan.endDate]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"m-bot15",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Estimated Cost: "})," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"travel-plan-price",children:["$",travelPlan.budget]})]})]})]})})})});};export default ViewPlanComponent;
